comments.body: Projects need to be updated to cos-cloud in this config.
Opps. I thought I updated everywhere. Apologies.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +51,55 @@  gci-resource1:
    image: cos-beta-59-9460-20-0
    project: google-containers
    machine: n1-standard-1
    metadata: "user-data<test/e2e_node/jenkins/gci-init.yaml,gci-update-strategy=update_disabled"

comments.body: Shouldn't image here be "containervm-v20160321-image"? Isn't "e2e-node-containervm-v20160321-image" is the node name created by node-e2e for image of "containervm-v20160321-image"?
Ignore above comment. We did re-create those images after running https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/test/e2e_node/environment/setup_host.sh and save it for e2e testings.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +2,6 @@images:
